tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following does not occur after the passage of a cold front?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Wind direction shift
X) Drop in relative humidity
Y) Drop in barometric pressure
Z) Clearing skies
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Y) DROP IN BAROMETRIC PRESSURE
bonus_question: -   –  What is the name for the opening found on the surface of volcanic systems that vents volcanic gases?
